title: Amirah Hamid
text:
Amirah Hamid



Welcome to my personal knowledge repository.
Join me on a journey of exploration and discovery.

title: Amirah Hamid
text:
Biography
I’m a PhD Candidate in Computer Science at the School of Digital Science, Universiti Brunei Darussalam. A passionate researcher with strong foundations in AI, deep learning and computer vision. I have experience working with CNNs, Vision Transformers (ViT), and explainability tools like SHAP and Grad-CAM.
Life is the greatest learning platform and I believe that teaching is alternative way of learning.

title: Amirah Hamid
text:
Research Interests

Deep Learning for Computer Vision (Natural & Medical Imaging)
Multi-task Learning
Explainable AI (Attention Mechanism, SHAP, Grad-CAM)
Regression model for medical imaging domain
Data Analytics

title: Amirah Hamid
text:
Education

PhD in Computer Science – Universiti Brunei Darussalam, Negara Brunei Darussalam (2023 – Present)

MPhil. in Electronic System Engineering – Universiti Teknologi Malaysia, Malaysia (2019 – 2022)

Thesis: Alzheimer’s Disease Classification using Attention Mechanism and Global Average Pooling on a Convolutional Neural Network


B.Eng. in Electronic System Engineering – Universiti Teknologi Malaysia (2015 – 2019)

Final Year Project: Livestock Monitoring Using One-Shot Learning

Foundation in Science (Sains Hayat) – Universiti Malaya, Malaysia (2014 – 2015)
Upper Secondary School: MARA Junior Science College Taiping (Science Stream) – Perak, Malaysia (2012 – 2013)
Lower Secondary School: MARA Junior Science College Pendang (Science Stream) – Kedah, Malaysia (2009 – 2011)
